dictionary.name: remark
dictionary.definition: To remark is to say something. - Remarquer, c'est dire quelque chose
dictionary.example: The teacher remarked on how quickly the students were learning. L'enseignant a noté la rapidité avec laquelle les élèves apprenaient.
